attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition for England to accept Cornwall as an independent nation and to provide the country with its own Assembly. Although the English do not like it it is inevitable no matter how hard they try to prevent it. The options are simple give Kernow power from the top or let the English embrace the risk of power being taken from below (something which they obviously fear in number 10)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
